thread.title_full: Troy Deeney: Arsenal's Aaron Ramsey bottled it vs Watford | Daily Mail Online

author: James Andrew For Mailonline
title: Troy Deeney: Arsenal's Aaron Ramsey bottled it vs Watford | Daily Mail Online
text: comments Troy Deeney has accused Arsenal midfielder Aaron Ramsey of bottling in Arsenal's defeat by the Hornets last week. Watford pulled off a shock result when they went to The Emirates and beat Arsenal 2-1 and Deeney has had some strong words to say about the Arsenal and Wales midfielder. Ramsey deflected Younes Kaboul's early free kick into his own net after he turned his back on the ball â€“ something Deeney was not impressed by. Arsenal midfielder Aaron Ramsey (second right) watches as Younes Kaboul's free kick goes in Ramsey looks dejected as he walks off the pitch after picking up an injury He said: 'I think he bottled it a little bit; Ramsey's mistake was our blessing.
